modName: Mega Cheat Savegame Nadja the Redguard at Riverwood start
summary: Mega Cheat Savegame Nadja the Redguard at Riverwood start (no quests done yet) All skills, perks, gold, picks, super armor/weaps. I recommend playing this at hardest difficulty and only if you already finished the game in standard difficulty without cheats.
descriptionHtml:
Mega Cheat Savegame Nadja the Redguard at Riverwood start (no quests done yet) All skills, perks, gold, lockpicks, super armor/weaps. I recommend playing this at hardest difficulty and only if you already finished the game in standard difficulty without cheats. 

She hasn\'t done anything yet, but Nadja has full dragonplate armor/shield, daedric sword/bow/arrows(20K), all skills at 100 with all perks. She\'s moves 4 times faster than normal. She also has 9999 magicka/health/stamina. She has 2Million gold, 20K lockpicks. 20k grand soulgems black/white, and 20k potions of prolonged invisibility. Shout delay set to 0.  I didn\'t add the shouts and spells because it\'s more fun to discover them one by one. Max carryweight set to 200,000!

Note: I have a few plugins installed so you might get a warning about missing objects the first time you load the save if you don\'t install them but I think it can be ignored or you can install them if you prefer.

Note: If you click on (required files) link to the right, you will get a quick link to the mods mentioned below although they\'re not really required just recommended.

I have the following mods installed:
- more zoom in eagle eye archery and less stamina
- nude female body  (by the pal)
- get all arrows back from corpses
- more revealing glass/wolf/fur/forsworn armor
- enhanced eyes and high elf eye replacement
- high rez roadsigns
- increased jumpheight
- no intro movie
- texture blockiness fix
- younger faces
- enable lockpick with arrow keys
author: heroshi
